com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

Class InsertCounterOnCollisionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.AbstractRuleFactory
      • com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules.InsertCounterOnCollisionFactory

  • public class InsertCounterOnCollisionFactory
extends AbstractRuleFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a counter at a specific position

    0.1
    Author:
    paco
